long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Context Menu QR Code Generator. If you want to keep the development of this app or you are pleased with the functionality, please make a paypal donation to my paypal account arthur@afarias.org.
